p: M. tuberculosis H37Ra was grown on Löwenstein-Jensen slopes (BioMaxima, Lublin, Poland) for up to two weeks. Bacterial mass was transferred to 5 mL of the fresh Middlebrook 7H9 broth supplemented with 10% ADC and vortex with 1 mm glass beads for 3 min. After 30 min of incubation (lager clumps sedimentation) in room temperature, upper 2 mL was transferred to a sterile tube and left for next 15 min. One milliliter of supernatant was placed in a sterile tube and was adjusted to 0.5 McFarland standard with ADC-supplemented Middlebrook 7H9 broth. The density of bacterial suspension used for the plate inoculation was 1 × 10 6 CFU/mL.
